app - package app
Main package, contains all other packages.
app.src - package app.src
Source package, contains everything to run the Mainclass in app.

Core package, contains The classes that define the Gameloop.

Resource package, contains all resources.

Asset package, contains all assets like Images and also classes to load these assets.

Asset package, contains all Audio assets and a mapping table for the Loader.
app.src.resources.components - package app.src.resources.components
Component package, contains all basic components which can be used in Scenes or for Entities.
app.src.resources.monsters - package app.src.resources.monsters
Monster package, contains classes to create and spawn Monsters.
app.src.scenes - package app.src.scenes
